mapper.insert: insert into file_info (file_original_name, file_union_name, file_real_path, file_suffix, file_url, file_size, file_upload_time, md5) values (#{fileOriginalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileUnionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileRealPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSuffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fileUploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update file_info set file_original_name = #{fileOriginalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_union_name = #{fileUnionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_real_path = #{fileRealPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_suffix = #{fileSuffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_url = #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_size = #{fileSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, file_upload_time = #{fileUploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, md5 = #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select file_id, file_original_name, file_union_name, file_real_path, file_suffix, file_url, file_size, file_upload_time, md5 from file_info where file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select file_id, file_original_name, file_union_name, file_real_path, file_suffix, file_url, file_size, file_upload_time, md5 from file_info
